Title: 039: Key Data Science and Statistical Skills to Get Hired at VSCO
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Director of Data Science at VSCO Ruben Kogel. You will hear how to build a data culture in an organization, learn about setting up and analyzing A/B tests and know the ideal qualities of data scientists.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/39
